title: Direct Instruction Design Manual
description: DOK1 Assessment - Direct Instruction Design Manual
author: Zach Groshell
rejection_reason: Document contains 30+ academic citations but zero statements of what those papers found. All content is prescriptive ("You should...") or operational (rubrics, specs, project scope).
rejection_subtype: Compound Doc (Design Manual + Project Doc + Reference List)
rejection_recommendation: Convert to brainlift by adding factual claims like "Wouters & van Oostendorp (2013) meta-analysis found games with instructional support produced effect size of X vs. Y for games alone."

title: Applying How Vocabulary is Learned
description: DOK1 Assessment - Applying principles from vocabulary research to educational programming
author: Marcello Sgambelluri
flags: Fact 2.4 (Score 2): The '50-100%' increase in difficulty from semantic sets is a specific statistical claim that needs a direct source. Interference theory is valid but this number appears unverified.
Missing source link for Kate Nation Lexical Quality Hypothesis (Fact 3.5 notes 'link:' with nothing after it in the brainlift).

title: AlphaWrite: Aligning AI Writing Practice with The Writing Revolution
